TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 用於將組件中的型別定義在 SQL Server 中標記為使用者定義型別 (UDT)。

span.span: Used to mark a type definition in an assembly as a user-defined type (UDT) in SQL Server.

summary.span: 該屬性 (Attribute) 上的屬性 (Property) 反映使用 SQL Server 註冊型別時使用的實體特性。

span.span: The properties on the attribute reflect the physical characteristics used when the type is registered with SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SQL Server 建立繫結至具有型別定義的使用者定義型別自訂屬性。SQL Server creates a user-defined type that is bound to the type definition that has the custom attribute. 每個 UDT 都必須有這個屬性註解。Every UDT must be annotated with this attribute. 請參閱[clr 使用者定義型別](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=128028)如需有關 Udt 的詳細資訊，包括之 UDT 的範例。See [CLR User-Defined Types](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=128028) for more information about UDTs, including an example of a UDT. ## Examples 下列範例所示`UserDefinedType`Point UDT 屬性。The following example shows the `UserDefinedType` attribute of the Point UDT. UDT 是位元組排序名為 「 點 」，有一個名為"ValidatePoint，"的驗證方法，會使用原生序列化格式。The UDT is byte-ordered, is named "Point", has a validation method named "ValidatePoint", and uses the native serialization format. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlUserDefinedTypeAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.Format format) cil managed

param.name: format
param.span: 其中一個 值，表示型別的序列化 (Serialization) 格式。

span.span: One of the values representing the serialization format of the type.

summary.span: 使用者定義型別 (UDT) 上的必要屬性，用於確認指定的型別是 UDT，並指出 UDT 的儲存格式。

span.span: A required attribute on a user-defined type (UDT), used to confirm that the given type is a UDT and to indicate the storage format of the UDT.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列範例會指定`Format`使用者定義型別是`SerializedDataWithMetadata`而`MaxByteSize`為 8000 個位元組。The following example specifies that the `Format` of the user-defined type is `SerializedDataWithMetadata` and the `MaxByteSize` is 8000 bytes. ## Examples [!code-csharp[VbRaddataSQLObjects#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/CS/Type1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[VbRaddataSQLObjects#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/VB/Type1.vb#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Format As Format
public: property Microsoft::SqlServer::Server::Format Format { Microsoft::SqlServer::Server::Format get(); };

summary.span: 做為 的序列化格式。

value.span: 表示序列化格式的 值。

span.span: A value representing the serialization format.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsByteOrdered { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsByteOrdered : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指出使用者定義型別是否依位元組排序。

span.span: Indicates whether the user-defined type is byte ordered.

value.span: 如果使用者定義型別是依位元組排序，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the user-defined type is byte ordered; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定為`true`，則屬性實際上可保證序列化的二進位資料可以用於資訊的語意排序。When set to `true`, the property in effect guarantees that the serialized binary data can be used for semantic ordering of the information. 因此，每個位元組排序的 UDT 物件執行個體只能有一個序列化表示法。Thus, each instance of a byte-ordered UDT object can only have one serialized representation. 比對作業執行時在 SQL Server 上序列化的位元組，其結果應該相同，如果相同的比較作業中發生的 managed 程式碼...When a comparison operation is performed in SQL Server on the serialized bytes, its results should be the same as if the same comparison operation had taken place in managed code.. 支援下列功能時設為`true`:The following features are supported when is set to `true`: - 此類型的資料行上建立索引的能力。The ability to create indexes on columns of this type. - 建立主要與外部索引鍵，以及此類型的資料行的核取和 UNIQUE 條件約束的能力。The ability to create primary and foreign keys as well as CHECK and UNIQUE constraints on columns of this type. - 使用 TRANSACT-SQL ORDER BY、 GROUP BY 和 PARTITION BY 子句的功能。The ability to use Transact-SQL ORDER BY, GROUP BY, and PARTITION BY clauses. 在這些情況下，類型的二進位表示法用來決定的順序。In these cases, the binary representation of the type is used to determine the order. - 能夠在 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式中使用比較運算子。The ability to use comparison operators in Transact-SQL statements. - 保存此類型的計算資料行的能力。The ability to persist computed columns of this type. 請注意，同時`Native`並`UserDefined`序列化格式支援下列比較運算子時設定為`true`:Note that both the `Native` and `UserDefined` serialization formats support the following comparison operators when is set to `true`: - 等於 （=）Equal to (=) - 不等於 (!=)Not equal to (!=) - 大於 (>)Greater than (>) - 小於 (\<)Less than (\<) - 大於或等於 (>=)Greater than or equal to (>=) - 小於或等於 (<=)Less than or equal to (<=)

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsFixedLength { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsFixedLength : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指出這個使用者定義型別的所有執行個體 (Instance) 是否為同一長度。

span.span: Indicates whether all instances of this user-defined type are the same length.

value.span: 如果這個型別的所有執行個體長度相同，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if all instances of this type are the same length; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果設定為`true`，Udt 對應到此 common language runtime (CLR) 類型的所有執行個體必須具有長度以位元組為單位完全等於。If set to `true`, all instances of UDTs corresponding to this common language runtime (CLR) type must have a length in bytes exactly equal to . 這個屬性才適用與 udt`UserDefined`序列化。This attribute is only relevant for UDTs with `UserDefined` serialization .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxByteSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxByteSize : int with get, set

summary.span: 執行個體的最大大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The maximum size of the instance, in bytes.

value.span: 值，表示執行個體的最大大小。

span.span: An value representing the maximum size of the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須指定具有屬性`UserDefined`序列化。You must specify the property with the `UserDefined` serialization . 當連接到 SQL Server 2005 或更早版本，必須介於 1 到 8000 之間。When connecting to SQL Server 2005 or earlier, must be between 1 and 8000. 當連接到 SQL Server 2008 或更新版本，設定介於 1 到 8000，類型的執行個體永遠是 8,000 個位元組或更少。When connecting to SQL Server 2008 or later, set between 1 and 8000, for a type whose instances are always 8,000 bytes or less. 對於可以有超過 8000 的執行個體的型別，指定-1。For types that can have instances larger than 8000, specify -1. 使用指定的使用者定義序列化 udt指 UDT 在其序列化形式的大小總計，如使用者所定義。For a UDT with user-defined serialization specified, refers to the total size of the UDT in its serialized form as defined by the user. 請考慮與 10 個字元的字串屬性的 UDT ()。Consider a UDT with a property of a string of 10 characters (). 當使用序列化 UDT 時、 序列化字串的總大小是 22 個位元組，第 2 個位元組，每個 Unicode utf-16 字元，乘以字元，最大數目加上 2 個控制位元組負擔所產生序列化的二進位資料流。When the UDT is serialized using a , the total size of the serialized string is 22 bytes: 2 bytes per Unicode UTF-16 character, multiplied by the maximum number of characters, plus 2 control bytes of overhead incurred from serializing a binary stream. 所以，當您決定的值，必須考慮序列化 UDT 的總大小： 以二進位格式序列化資料，再加上序列化所造成的負擔的大小。So, when determining the value of , the total size of the serialized UDT must be considered: the size of the data serialized in binary form plus the overhead incurred by serialization. 這個屬性不應使用`Native`序列化。This property should not be used with `Native` serialization .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: 使用者定義型別的 SQL Server 名稱。

span.span: The SQL Server name of the user-defined type.

value.span: 值，表示使用者定義型別的 SQL Server 名稱。

span.span: A value representing the SQL Server name of the user-defined type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性不會使用 SQL Server 內，但會使用由 Microsoft Visual Studio.NET 整合式開發環境 (IDE)。The property is not used within SQL Server, but is used by the Microsoft Visual Studio .NET Integrated Development Environment (IDE).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ValidationMethodName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationMethodName : string with get, set

summary.span: 方法的名稱，用於驗證使用者定義型別的執行個體。

span.span: The name of the method used to validate instances of the user-defined type.

value.span: ，表示方法的名稱，用於驗證使用者定義型別的執行個體。

span.span: A representing the name of the method used to validate instances of the user-defined type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 來自不受信任的二進位值，已還原序列化 UDT 時，這個屬性所指定的方法會驗證 UDT 執行個體。The method specified by this attribute validates instances of the UDT when the UDT has been deserialized from a binary value that is not trusted.
